                              General Information
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Type.................: Game		|
Platform.............: Windows   	|
Serial...............: Embedded		|
Crack................: Included		|
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Release Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mass Effect is an action role-playing game developed by BioWare for Xbox 360 and Microsoft Windows. The Xbox 360 edition was released worldwide in November 2007. The PC edition was released on May 28, 2008, having been published by Electronic Arts. The game takes place in the year 2183, with the player assuming the role of an elite human soldier named Commander Shepard, set out to explore the Galaxy on his ship, the SSV Normandy. In addition to plans for two sequels to complete a trilogy, BioWare plans to release episodic content via Xbox Live to fill in the story between each game, though these episodes are not essential for understanding the main plot line. The first of these downloadable content packages was released on March 10, 2008 for the Xbox 360 only. A PC edition of this additional content is due for release in summer 2008.

This release allows for the portable gameplay of the Mass Effect campaign, without suffering from the now infamous "Star Map" and "Saving Glitches" associated with early releases of this game. This release contains custom made icons. This release has had unnecessary content removed leaving it five-hundred megabytes smaller. Moreover this release has been customized to include several bug fixes, vastly improving overall game stability compared to other releases. 

As this release is not a "common" Federal release it will receive no updates.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                              Miscellaneous Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Please Note The Following:

.I.
The Federation takes no responsibility for any damage that may come to your computer through the trial of this game. This mod has been tested to work 
on Windows XP and Vista. No support or technical assistance will be provided. 
Ever. Creation of this release took ten hours of unpaid labour. 
.II.
As this was not a "common" Federal release the Federation deemed it an unnecessary waste of time to create a modified executable file. The modified executable file used in this release was therefore made by the ViTALiTY scene group and the Federation takes no credit for its release. ViTALiTY has shown tremendous talent and skill in security reverse engineering. Their content was released without their permission. 
.III.
This game only possesses a single player function.
.IV.
I am ZKZ. 
I am an INDEPENDENT member of the FEDERATION group. 
Props to the scene.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
                                 Install Notes
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Steps:

(1.) Extract the "MassEffect - Portable.rar" file to a directory of your  
choice and then Navigate to the extracted directory (by default "Mass Effect - Portable"  directory. Double-click on the "MassEffect_Mod-Crack_ZKZ.exe"program. This program is not necessary as it only installs shortcuts (makes no changes to the game files which are already updated, modded, and cracked).
(2.) Click through the installation instructions. Make certain that you install 
the Mod-Crack to the "MassEffect" directory, which is by default located inside the "Mass Effect - Portable"  directory.
(3.) Open the desired shortcut (which by default is) located on your desktop to 
start the game. 

Shortcut Information:

"Mass Effect"                          - Game Launcher
"Mass Effect - Configuration"          - Game Configuration

Extras:

The Official Mass Effect Manual, and Cover can be found in the "Extras" directory (defualt "x:MassEffect - PortableMassEffectExtras")

                                  In The Pipeline
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
T-BOX - ZKZ of the Federation Team

Games - Pending
EMUs  - Complete
NFO   - Pending
Test  - Complete

This release is imminent. This project seeks to combine a Lite (less than 700m)
Vista build, bootscreen, frontend, registry tweaks, several related 
applications, twenty-plus emulators and tens of thousands of various game 
images and ROMS in an orderly package. This package would then allow a user 
to easily create a SF personal computer (or any other light PC) that would 
act as any console from the first to sixth generation. This has been a huge
undertaking but if it is successful this project will provide the PC scene with 
the first real replacement for consoles. Please understand that projects like this one can have unsuspected kinks. Please be patient.

As many of you know opencoop recently released a tech demo of their next project Quake 4 Co-op which allows you to traverse most of the levels, with large amounts of lag, glitches, and crashes. Once they have a clean version working, this Crack-Mod will be released. Because we are waiting for them to finish their work there is no release date.
